block_registrations_if_not_applicable.description: Block registrations when discount cannot be applied to all discountable tickets. Default is `false`.

code.description: The code that will be distributed to provide a discount.

description_for_organizer.description: Only visible to organizers. Useful for keeping track of what discount codes are for.

disable_for_degressive.description: Disable this discount code if it's used with degressive pricing (see `release#price_degressive`).

end_at.description: The time when the discount code becomes unavailable.

max_quantity_per_release.description: Discount only applies to a maximum of this number.

min_quantity_per_release.description: Discount only applies if this many tickets are selected.

quantity.description: The number of tickets that can avail of this discount code.

quantity_used.description: The number of tickets this discount code has been applied to.

registrations_count.description: The number of `registrations` that used this discount code. Will be more than the `quantity_used` if people buy multiple `tickets` at the same time.

releases.description: The `releases` this discount code can be applied to.

share_url.description: Shareable link to give access to the discount.

show_public_releases.description: Whether all public tickets are shown when this discount code is used. If set to "all" (default) then they are all shown; if set to "only_attached" then public tickets are only shown if they are attached to this discount code.

show_secret_releases.description: Whether secret tickets are revealed when this discount code is used. Set to "none" (default) to have them not revealed;  "if_discount_code_available" to reveal them if this discount code is available; and "even_if_discount_code_not_available" if they should be revealed regardless of whether this discount code is available or not.

start_at.description: The time when the discount code becomes available.

state.description: Either `upcoming`, `current` or `past` depending on the `start_at` and `end_at` values.

tickets_count.description: How many tickets have been bought with this discount code.

type.description: The kind of discount to apply. `MoneyOffDiscountCode` applies a flat discount. `PercentOffDiscountCode` applies a percentage discount.

value.description: The amount off per ticket. A percentage or flat amount depending on the discount code type.
